review: LOVE IT...I use it at least once a day..it stays in my TV and so simple to use..however sometimes the quality is not HD maybe because of strength of internet service
author: kiss0809

review: Arrived on time. Does what it needs to do.
author: DT

review: This thing is awesome for the kids room. I live in a apple environment and this thing fits in perfectly. I mainly use this on the kids tv so they can Disney jr since there is no cable in their room.
author: Pablo Herrera

review: Great product you won't regret!! I also bought an adapter because the hdmi port on our tv is really close to the tv. I was trying to be better safe than sorry. Well this actually comes with an adapter alongside the micro usb cable and charger. Fits great and works fantastic 👍
author: Magen Witzleb

review: already have one and im buying another one for my new non-smart TV.I would even buy it for LG smart TVs bc LG's interface sucks and lags as hell.Screen mirroring is kind of s***ty pretty much unwatchable
author: Felipe

review: it is neat that you can put any website on your tv. Only thing is sometimes it freezes, but it is good otherwise
author: Chase Dahmer

review: Thank you!! Arrived faster than the scheduled due date! Works just as described. #veryhappyclient.
author: Nneka

review: I bought this on a lark and I ended up loving it. I can cast all the movie channels, even Encore and Epix. It's great for someone looking for more than just the content you can get on your TV channels.
author: cyberspastic

review: Almost always works perfectly. Occasional choppy video or trouble connecting.
author: Gil
